[CAT](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/cat/translations#Noun) is a [wanderword](Wanderword) attestet in myriads of languages  
In Egyptian:  
[𓄂](𓄂) 𓎛𓄿𓏏𓏮𓄣 H.Ar.t ♥    𓇉𓏏𓄣 Ḫr.t ♥    𓄂𓏏𓏮𓄣 cha.t ♥
